actions.Multiattack: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.
actions.Greatclub: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Rock: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
